aka: Doctor, Please Take Care of the Leading Man's Heart
Mo Ja Raksa Huajai Phra-ek Noi
医生，请照顾好男主角的心脏

cast.name: 苏帕达奇·维莱拉特  Suphadach Wilairat
格威帕·塔纳尤南邢 Kavinpat Thanahiransilp
蓓斯·诺拉塔普·侬塔拉特 Best Noratape Nontarat

this_title: หมอจ๋า รักษาหัวใจ พระเอก หน่อย
trans_title: Doctor, Please Take Care of the Leading Man's Heart
Mo Ja Raksa Huajai Phra-ek Noi
医生，请照顾好男主角的心脏
introduction: 当男主角明暖在一个孤岛上拍摄他的最新作品时，摄制组被误认为是联邦特工在暗中观察当地毒品交易的动向。因此，本应一帆风顺的拍摄最终被意外事件所拖累，包括从一架jeski上摔下来，导致他耳鸣。在医院，他遇到了纳姆宁医生。每一次遭遇，他们都会陷入一些算是吵架吧。这两者反复冲突，直到明暖的心脏而不是他的耳朵处于危急状态。While leading man Mingmueang films his lastest work on an idillic island, the film crew is mistaken for federal agents undercover to observe the movements of local drug dealing. What should have been a smooth shoot, therefore, ends up being bogged down by accidents including a brutal fall from a jeski that leaves his ears ringing.At the hospital, he meets Dr. Namning. With every encounter, they're bound to get into some kind of quarrel. The two clash repeatedly until it's Mingmueang's heart that's in critical condition, not his ears.
foreign_title: หมอจ๋า รักษาหัวใจ พระเอก หน่อย
